articles.content:
More than 72,000 laboratory tests were conducted for checking novel coronavirus or SARS-CoV-2, which causes COVID-19, in the country, the Department of Health (DOH) said Saturday. Video by PTV
Visit us at https://www.inquirer.netFacebook: https://facebook.co… [+58 chars]
